page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: { { 95%}of our area is farmland. There are {12 }farms. {70% }is arable,{30% grazing & silage. The farms vary in size from {200 }to{400}acres. There are {755}cattle at present on the fields, {1250}sheep,{288}Poultry and{6}pigs. The main crops grown are spring and winter barley, winter wheat, oil seed rape & sugar beet. The soils to the east are stronger & are not suitable for roor crops. The land to the west of area is lighter & is suitable for all crops. The fields over much of the area are drained by dykes & ditches.
